Character viewer

A tool to view animated characters, run and test their animations, test socket locations by equiping, change attributes(char length, haircolor, skincolor, ...) and possibly more ...


Interface

Main Toolbar

Displayed at the top of the screen, it allows to switch between the different windows. 

-----------------------------------------------------
| [Character] [Animations] [Equipment] [Attributes] |
-----------------------------------------------------

Character 

|=======================|
| ===================== |
| | Knight            |A|                               
| | Skeleton          |I|                               
| | Dragon Fly        |I|                                    
| | Horse             |V|
| ===================== |
|-----------------------|
| --------     -------- |
| |Reload|     |Select| |
| --------     -------- |
|_______________________|

Animations 

|=======================|
| ===================== |
| | Walk              |A|                               
| | Run               |I|                               
| | Sword slash       |I|                                    
| | Sit               |V|
| ===================== |
|-----------------------|
| ------        ------  |
| |Stop|        |Play|  |
| ------        ------  |
|_______________________|

Equipment 

|===========================X===|
| ============================= |
| |ID| Name         |   Socket| |         
| ----------------------------- |
| |99 LongBow        RightHand|A| 
| |53 Small Shield   LeftHand |I| 
| |98 Quiver         Back     |I|                               
| |21 Leather boots  Feet     |V|
| ============================= |
|  --------  ------- ---------  |
|  |Reload|  |Equip| |Unequip|  |
|  --------  ------- ---------  |
|  -------------                |
|  |Unequip All|                |
|  -------------                |
|_______________________________|
